name: canvas-utils
description: Utility functions for the HTML5 canvas

scripts.test-coveralls: npm run istanbul && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.coverage: rm -rf coverage && npm run istanbul && istanbul report html && serve coverage
scripts.istanbul: npm run build && istanbul cover es5-generated/test/test.js
scripts.build: rm -rf es5-generated && mkdir es5-generated  && babel src-es6 --out-dir es5-generated

author: Till Arnold
